mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD_DEMO(BIDX, TITLE, CONTENTS, USERID, WRITEDATE, MODDATE) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{userId}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT BIDX, TITLE, CONTENTS, USERID, HITCNT, WRITEDATE FROM TB_BOARD_DEMO ORDER BY BIDX DESC
SELECT BIDX, TITLE, CONTENTS, USERID, HITCNT, WRITEDATE FROM TB_BOARD_DEMO WHERE BIDX = #{bidx}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD_DEMO SET HITCNT = HITCNT+1 WHERE bidx = #{bidx}
UPDATE TB_BOARD_DEMO SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, MODDATE=SYSDATE WHERE BIDX = #{bidx} and userid = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM TB_BOARD_DEMO
